name: Stick Run (odevperel)
description:
Have you ever wanted to race your friend online through challenging platforming maps by controlling an active ragdoll? 

Well, that's oddly specific, but now you can!

Stick Run is an online multiplayer game in which you control a physics-based active ragdoll. You have to speedrun different challenging levels with moving obstacles and powerups in order to beat your friend! 

Stick Run has:

  • 10 challenging levels 
  • Online Multiplayer
  • Character customization 
  • An in-game chat
  • A speedrun timer
  • A $0 price tag

You can see how the game was developed on my YouTube channel :)
